globalOffices.title: Ebyenkonkola By’Ensi Yonna Eby’okuyingiramunda
globalOffices.subtitle: Kebera ofiisi zaffe ez’ensi yonna, omanye ebiragiriro bye tukuwa mu kifo kyonka
globalOffices.heroSubtitle: Obuwereere bwaffe mu Nsi Yonna n’Obumanyirivu bw’Abakiriya
globalOffices.mapSubtitle: Laba Ofiisi Zaffe mu Nsi Yonna
globalOffices.listSubtitle: Shakira Ofiisi Eririmu Ku Lubono Lwo

teamMembers.title: Ttiimu Yaffe ey’Ensikirano Yonna
teamMembers.subtitle: Wenyigire mu bannamawulire abakulembera okukola obulungi mu bitundu byaffe byonna
teamMembers.noMembers: Tewali bantu ba ttiimu basigadde mu ofiisi eno kati

pierre-kemeni.name: Pierre KEMENI
pierre-kemeni.title: Omukulu w’Enkola & Sentebe
pierre-kemeni.bio: Mufatanya, Omukulu w’Enkola mu EXCI-MAA Group. Mukugga w’ekibiina eya COSUMAF ey’okukola eby’okuwandiika ebitabo n’okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo. Yawandiisibwa mu ICPAR, ONECCA, CPA Canada, Quebec, Ontario ne UK. Yali Omukulu w’Obukwakkulizo mu Deloitte Toronto. Omumanyirivu mu kulamula, SYSCOHADA, okuhindura ebitabo. Mukozi w’okugeraageranya ow’ensi yonna n’omuzigiriza.

patrick-ngatcha.name: Patrick NGATCHA
patrick-ngatcha.title: Mufatanya - Omukulu w’Enkola
patrick-ngatcha.bio: Mukugga w’ekibiina eyawandiisibwa mu Institute of Chartered Accountants e Paris Ile de France. Omukugu w’okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo. Omumanyirivu mu misolo n’okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo, okukola eby’okugulwa, okugatta (amateeka 99-02 / IFRS).

cloudin-ngong.name: Cloudin NGONG
cloudin-ngong.title: Omulabirizi - Ekibiina ky’Eby’okuwandiika Ebitabo
cloudin-ngong.bio: Omukugu w’ebyensimbi w’umumanyirivu mu misolo n’okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo. Alabirira enkola z’ekibiina ky’eby’okuwandiika ebitabo.

janot-hiag.name: Janot HIAG
janot-hiag.title: Omukugu w’Eby’okugeraageranya & Okukola Eby’okugulwa kwa Petiroli
janot-hiag.bio: Omumanyirivu mu kukola eby’okugulwa kwa petiroli, obukuumi bw’ensimbi ez’okuyingira, okugeraageranya eby’okugulwa n’okuhindura obugagga, okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo n’amateeka, n’okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo.

eric-kabeza.name: Eric KABEZA
eric-kabeza.title: Mufatanya Omukulu w’Emisolo - Rwanda
eric-kabeza.bio: Omumanyirivu mu misolo y’eggwanga n’ensi yonna n’emyaka egisukka mu 20 akola mu Rwanda Revenue Authority. Mukozi w’okugeraageranya/omujuliriza w’emisolo y’amasosiyete n’abantu ku bubwe. Omulabirizi w’okugondera emisolo n’omugeraageranya w’amateeka.

jean-nahimana.name: Jean Berchmas
jean-nahimana.title: Mufatanya - Okukola Eby’okuzza Obukwakkulizo n’Emisolo
jean-nahimana.bio: Mukugga w’ekibiina, Omumyuka wa ICPAR. Okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo n’emisolo. Omugeraageranya w’ekikugu mu bitabo n’omumanyirivu mu by’ensimbi n’uburambe mu kuteekateeka ebyensimbi n’okugeraageranya.

martin-nkwain.name: Marcel NKWAIN
martin-nkwain.title: Omukulu w’Ebitundu - Afrika ey’Ebuvanjuba
martin-nkwain.bio: Omumanyirivu wa HARDCAT mu kulamula obugagga obutawera. Okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo n’emisolo. Mukozi w’okugeraageranya ow’ensi yonna n’omuzigiriza akulembera enkola za EXCI-MAA mu Afrika ey’Ebuvanjuba.

paul-tchamake.name: Olivier Fodji
paul-tchamake.title: Mufatanya - Emisolo y’Ensi Yonna & Obugagga bw’Okugabana
paul-tchamake.bio: Mukugga w’ekibiina eyawandiisibwa (enkola za Amerika ne France). Omumanyirivu mu misolo y’ensi yonna, ASC 740 (Amateeka ya US GAAP). Emyaka egisukka mu 15 mu bitangaza ebyensimbi n’emisolo y’ensi yonna n’uburambe mu Big 4 mu KPMG ne PwC Amerika. Omumanyirivu mu bugagga bw’okugabana ne BEPS.

diane-dusabe.name: Diane DUSABE
diane-dusabe.title: Omukulu w’Ofiisi - Burundi
diane-dusabe.bio: Omukulu w’ofiisi ow’uburambe akulira enkola za EXCI-MAA mu Burundi. Omumanyirivu mu mibanire y’abakiriya n’okukulaakulanya ebyenkonkola mu bitundu.

onesphore-ofodji.name: Onesphore OFODJI
onesphore-ofodji.title: Omugeraageranya Omukulu - Burundi
onesphore-ofodji.bio: Omugeraageranya w’ebyenkonkola omukulu w’umumanyirivu mu kukulaakulanya amasoko g’ebitundu n’ebiragiriro by’ensimbi ku byenkonkola mu Burundi.

congo-director.name: Omukulu w’Ebitundu
congo-director.title: Omukulu - Enkola za DRC
congo-director.bio: Akulira enkola za EXCI-MAA mu Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Kongo, agenderera ku biragiriro by’okukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo n’ebyenkonkola.

gabon-manager.name: Omukulu w’Ebitundu
gabon-manager.title: Omukulu - Enkola za Gabon
gabon-manager.bio: Okulamula ebiragiriro bya EXCI-MAA mu Gabon agenderera ku kukola eby’okuzza obukwakkulizo n’ebiragiriro by’amasosiyete ku bakiriya b’omu bitundu n’ensi yonna.

dubai-consultant.name: Omugeraageranya Omukulu
dubai-consultant.title: Omugeraageranya w’Ebyenkonkola Omukulu - Dubai
dubai-consultant.bio: Omumanyirivu mu kuteekateeka ebyenkonkola by’ensi yonna n’okuteekateeka emisolo ku masosiyete agenderera okwongera mu masoko g’eby’Abuvanjuba bwa Aziya.

france-partner.name: Mufatanya
france-partner.title: Mufatanya - Enkola za France
france-partner.bio: Akulira enkola za mu Bulaaya n’obumanyirivu mu kugondera amateeka ga EU n’ebiragiriro by’okusomooza ensi.

canada-consultant.name: Omugeraageranya Omukulu
canada-consultant.title: Omugeraageranya w’Abimukira & Emisolo
canada-consultant.bio: Omumanyirivu mu biragiriro by’okumukira mu Canada n’okuteekateeka emisolo y’ensi yonna ku baamukira abapya ne masosiyete.

footer.description: Ekibuga ky'eby'okukola, okukakasa, n'okukulembeza ekirina obukulembeze bw'ensi yonna. Tugabira obukulembeze obw'omugaso okusobola okukola ebintu by'omugaso.

hero.title: Eby'okukola by'omugaso &
hero.subtitle: Eby'okukola by'omugaso, okukakasa, n'okukulembeza ebirina obukulembeze bw'ensi yonna. Tugabira ebisubizo by'omugaso okusobola okukola ebintu by'omugaso.
hero.description: Tuwereza ebisubizo by'eby'ensimbi ebipya n'amagezi g'enteekateeka okuyamba ebibiina n'abantu okunnyuka mu nsi y'ensimbi ezzibu n'okutegeera obulungi n'obwesige.

about.feature2Desc: Okusobola okukola abakiriya mu nsi nyingi n'amawanga
about.feature3Desc: Abantu baffe ab'omugaso bafuna obukulembeze batanga ebisubizo by'omugaso

contact.mapSubtitle: Sura amabiro gaffe ku nsi yonna

hero.description: Ekibiina kyaffe ky'abakulembeze b'eby'obusuubuzi kitegudde okukuyamba mu kukwata ebizibu by'ebikoresho byo. Kwatagana naffe ku nkola yonna eri wansi oba otutangire obubaka buhagije.

contactMethods.emailDescription: Ekibiina kyaffe kijja kuddamu mu ssaawa 24
contactMethods.callDescription: Olw'okubiri-Olw'okutaano okuva ku ssaawa 9 z'ekiro okutuuka ku ssaawa 5 z'ekiro

hero.orFillOut: Oba uzuze ekifaananyi kyaffe ky'okukwatagana era tujja kuddamu mu ssaawa 24.

form.title: Okukwatagana
form.subtitle: Olina ebibuuzo oba otegedde okutandika obwoba bwo? Uzuze ekifaananyi ekyo wansi era ekibiina kyaffe kijja kuddamu vuba.
form.description: Olina ebibuuzo oba otegedde okutandika obwoba bwo? Uzuze ekifaananyi ekyo wansi era ekibiina kyaffe kijja kuddamu vuba.
form.contactDescription: Uzuze ekifaananyi era ekibiina kyaffe kijja kuddamu mu ssaawa 24. Okufuna obuyambi obuhagije, nyamuneka otutangire buhagije.
form.name: Amannya
form.subject: Ekintu
form.successDescription: Webale okukwatagana. Twakiridde obubaka bwo era tujja kuddamu mu ssaawa 24.
form.errorMessage: Okutuma obubaka kukaluze. Nyamuneka ogezaako nanone.
form.privacyNote: Tujja kuddamu mu ssaawa 24. Amakulu go galimu mu mutekano.

map.description: Sura mu mabiro gaffe agali mu kifo ekirungi. Tuli wano okukuyamba mu byo byonna okenna by'eby'obusuubuzi.
map.helpDescription: Amabiro gaffe galimu mu kati k'ekitundu ky'ebikoresho era kirungi okufuna enkola z'okutambula.

faq.title: Ebibuuzo by'omugaso
faq.description: Shakisha ebisubizo ku bibuuzo by'omugaso ku by'okukola byaffe, enkola yaffe y'okukola, n'engeri tusobola okuyamba ebikoresho byo okukula.

questions.question: EXCI-MAA etanga ki eby'okukola?
questions.answer: Tutanga eby'okukola by'omugaso by'eby'obusuubuzi, okukakasa, omusolo, n'obunyangamugayo bw'ebikoresho ebyashyizibwawo ku byetaaga by'omugaso by'ebikoresho mu Arabiya Sawudite n'ebirala. Eby'okukola byaffe birimu amakulu g'eby'obusuubuzi, okutezimba omusolo, okukakasa kw'omunda, n'obunyangamugayo bw'ebikoresho.

questions.question: Nsobola otya okutegula obunyangamugayo?
questions.answer: Osobola okutegula obunyangamugayo binyuze mu kutangira amabiro gaffe, okutangira email, oba okukozesa ekifaananyi ky'okukwatagana ku lupapula luno. Ekibiina kyaffe kijja kuddamu mu ssaawa 24 okukakasa olunaku lwo.

questions.question: Mu ki eby'okukola mufuna obukulembeze?
questions.answer: Tufuna obukulembeze bw'omugaso mu kukola n'ebikoresho eby'enjawulo birimu obulwadde bw'abantu, okuzimba, okugulisa, eby'okukola, n'eby'okukola by'omugaso. Ekibiina kyaffe kifuna obukulembeze bwo kukola n'ebizibu by'eby'obusuubuzi by'omugaso by'ekikoresho kyonna.

questions.question: Essaawa z'amabiro ganyu ziri ki?
questions.answer: Amabiro gaffe gafunguka okuva ku Sabbiiti okutuuka ku Lwakuna, 9:00 AM okutuuka 6:00 PM. Tugguddwa ku Lwakutaano na Lwakaaga wamu n'olunaku olukulu.

questions.question: Mutanga eby'okukola by'omugaso oba by'omugaso?
questions.answer: Yee, tutanga obunyangamugayo bw'omugaso n'omugaso kugira ngo tukemere ebyetaaga by'abakiriya baffe. Ekibiina kyaffe kifuna ebikozesebwa by'omugaso by'omugaso byo kutanga eby'okukola by'omugaso ku bwoba.

questions.question: Mukemera otya obukulembeze bw'amakulu n'obukulembeze?
questions.answer: Tutanga obukulembeze bw'amakulu ku bwoba. Amakulu gonna g'abakiriya gakolwa n'obukulembeze bw'omugaso era gakuma nga gakozesa enkola z'okukuma z'omugaso, okusobola okukuma n'enkola y'okukuma amakulu.

faq.stillHaveDescription: Tosobola kushakisha ekisubizo oshakisha? Ekibiina kyaffe kiri wano okukuyamba. Kwatagana naffe era tujja kuddamu vuba.
faq.callDescription: Olw'okubiri okutuuka ku Lwakutaano, ssaawa 9 z'ekiro okutuuka ssaawa 6 z'ekiro
faq.expertsDescription: Ekibiina kyaffe ky'abakulembeze kiri wano okuddamu ebibuuzo byonna osobola okuba nabyo.

accounting.title: Okubala / Omusolo / Obukulembeze
courses: Engeri y'okukola oba okuteekawo raporo y'omusolo n'ebirala
Ekizibu ky'omusolo w'omusolo mu CONGO, CAMEROON, RWANDA, BURUNDI, GABON
Tekawo konti yo y'ebikoresho n'ekikwate ky'amafaranga
Enkola z'okusanga obukulembeze mu raporo z'omusolo
Obukulembeze wakati wa DAS, amakulu n'DSF: Ekizibu kya CNSS

audit.title: Okukakasa kw'amategeko / Okukulembeza obukulembeze
courses: Obukulembeze n'obukulembeze bw'okukakasa kw'omunda mu bikoresho bitono, amabanki n'obukulembeze
Okukulembeza obulungi obukulembeze bw'amafaranga, okusinga obukulembeze
Okutegeera ebikwetaagisa by'amafaranga okuva ku bwoba n'obukulembeze
Okutegeera ERP, obukulembeze bwabyo era laba n'ebikoresho byo bikyetaaga
Okusuzuma ebikwata ku bwoba bw'okukulembeza kw'omunda
Okusuzuma ebikwata ku bwoba bw'okukakasa kw'omunda

advice.title: Amagezi
courses: Obukulembeze bw'okukola amakulu g'ebikoresho n'obukulembeze bw'omusolo
Okutegeera ebikwata ku bwoba n'ebikwetaagisa by'omusolo w'ensi yonna: Okuteekawo omugatte
Okupima ebikoresho mu gace ka OHADA
Okusubira okupima obukulembeze: ekikwetaagisa ku bikoresho byonna
Obukulembeze bw'okugatta, okutandukana n'okukoma mu gace ka OHADA
Engeri y'okukola obukulembeze bw'amakulu mu gace ka OHADA
Okuyamba mu kwandika obukulembeze bw'okukulembeza kw'omunda

various.title: Ebintu eby'enjawulo
courses: Sobola obukulembeze bwo era ongere obukulembeze bwo mu bikoresho n'ebirala
Engeri y'okufuna obukulembeze bw'amafaranga/Obukulembeze oba CFO n'enkola ez'omugaso
Okukozesa okubala n'okukulembeze obukulembeze okukuma obukulembeze bw'amabanki

pierre.name: Pierre KEMENI
pierre.title: MBA, CPA, DEC
pierre.description: Mukugu mu kubala n'okukakasa, alina emyaka egisukka 27 mu bintu by'obukugu mu nsi yonna.
specialties: Kubala kwa Mbadde mu Nsi yonna

patrick.name: Patrick NGATCHA
patrick.title: DEC, DSCG, Master CCA, MSTCF
patrick.description: Mukugu mu kubala n'okukakasa alina emyaka egisukka 13 mu kukulaakulanya ebizimbe n'okumanya eby'ensimbi.

offices.title: Obukulembeze bw'ensi yonna
offices.subtitle: Okusobola okukola abakiriya ku nsi yonna

hero.title: Kyusa Ebikoresho byo n'
hero.subtitle: Manya engeri eby'okukola byaffe by'eby'obusuubuzi by'obukulembeze bishobola okutwala obukulembeze, okukakasa okukkirizibwa, era ne bongere obukulembeze bw'ebikoresho byo.

detailedServices.title: Eby'okukola byaffe
detailedServices.subtitle: Ebisubizo by'eby'obusuubuzi by'obukulembeze ebyashyizibwawo ku byetaaga by'ebikoresho byo eby'omugaso, era bitwala obukulembeze obukomeze.

accounting.title: Okubala n'Okukola
accounting.description: Ekibiina kyaffe ky'obukulembeze bw'okubala kitanga eby'okukola by'obukulembeze by'okukola amakulu g'eby'obusuubuzi go okukola obukulembeze n'obukulembeze. Tukola byonna okuva ku bikolwa by'olunaku ku lunaku okutuuka ku makulu g'eby'obusuubuzi ag'obukulembeze, tukakasa okukkirizibwa ku nkola zonna ez'omugaso.

audit.title: Okukakasa n'Obukulembeze
audit.description: Eby'okukola byaffe by'okukakasa bitanga okukakasa kw'obukulembeze kw'amakulu g'eby'obusuubuzi go, gikakasa obukulembeze n'okukkirizibwa ku nkola z'obukulembeze. Tuyamba okutegeera obukulembeze era ne tuleetawo obukulembeze bw'eby'obusuubuzi byo.

tax.title: Obunyangamugayo bw'omusolo
tax.description: Abakulembeze baffe b'omusolo batanga eby'okukola by'obukulembeze by'obukulembeze bw'omusolo n'okukkirizibwa kugira ngo tulembeze omusolo gwo nga tukakasa okukkirizibwa kw'obukulembeze ku mategeko gonna g'omusolo n'obukulembeze.

advisory.title: Obunyangamugayo bw'ebikoresho
advisory.description: Eby'okukola byaffe by'obunyangamugayo bw'ebikoresho biyamba amashyira okukwata obukulembeze bw'ebikoresho obukulembeze, tuleetawo obukulembeze, era ne tufuna obukulembeze bw'ebikoresho okuyita mu bukulembeze n'obukulembeze.

risk.title: Okukulembeza obukulembeze
risk.description: Eby'okukola byaffe by'obukulembeze bw'obukulembeze biyamba amashyira okutegeera, okupima, n'okukuma obukulembeze obusobola okukwata ku ntego z'ebikoresho n'obukulembeze.

hr.title: Eby'okukola by'abantu n'obukulembeze
hr.description: Eby'okukola byaffe by'abantu n'obukulembeze biyamba amashyira okukulembeza ebintu byabwe eby'obukulembeze - abantu babo - nga tukakasa okukkirizibwa ku mategeko g'obukulembeze n'obukulembeze.

detailedServices.needCustomSolution: Okenna isubizo ly'obukulembeze? Abakulembeze baffe bali wano okukuyamba.

process.title: Enkola yaffe
process.subtitle: Enkola ey'obukulembeze ey'okutanga eby'okukola by'eby'obusuubuzi by'obukulembeze ebyashyizibwawo ku byetaaga by'ebikoresho byo.

steps.title: Okusanga n'Okutegeera
steps.description: Tutandika no kutegeera byetaaga by'ebikoresho byo, obukulembeze, n'entegeka okuyita mu makulu n'okutegeera kw'obukulembeze.

steps.title: Okutanga n'Obukulembeze
steps.description: Tuleetawo gahunda y'obukulembeze y'obukulembeze n'entegeka ez'obukulembeze, amahitamo g'obukulembeze, n'ebyo tuteekawo ebyashyizibwawo ku byetaaga byo.

steps.title: Okutandika Ekibiina
steps.description: Ekibiina kyaffe ky'obukulembeze kikuteekawo ku bwoba bwo, kikakasa obukulembeze n'obukulembeze bwo gukola ku byetaaga byo eby'obukulembeze.

steps.title: Okukola
steps.description: Tukola eby'okukola by'obukulembeze n'obukulembeze, tukomeza obukulembeze ku buli kkubo lw'enkola.

steps.title: Okusuzuma n'Obukulembeze
steps.description: Tutanga amakulu n'okutegeera kw'obukulembeze, tukakasa obukulembeze bw'obukulembeze n'okutegeera kw'ebisubizo.

steps.title: Okuyamba ku Bwoba
steps.description: Obukulembeze bwaffe bukomeza n'obukulembeze bw'obukulembeze, okusuzuma by'obukulembeze, n'obunyangamugayo bw'obukulembeze bw'obukulembeze.

process.readyDescription: Ekibiina kyaffe ky'abakulembeze kitegudde okukuyobola okuyita mu nkola yaffe era ne kitanga eby'okukola by'eby'obusuubuzi by'obukulembeze ku bikoresho byo.

pricing.title: Obukulembeze
pricing.subtitle: Londa gahunda y'obukulembeze ku byetaaga by'ebikoresho byo. Tewali mafaranga g'obukulembeze, kuraho olunaku lwa buli lwo.

enterprise.name: Obukulembeze
enterprise.description: Ku bikoresho eby'obukulembeze n'ebyo okenna by'obukulembeze

pricing.needCustomSolution: Okenna isubizo ly'obukulembeze? Tugabira amapaki g'obukulembeze ku bikoresho n'ebyo okenna by'obukulembeze.
pricing.expertsHelp: Abakulembeze baffe bali wano okukuyamba londa isubizo ly'obukulembeze ku byetaaga by'ebikoresho byo. Tekawo obunyangamugayo bwa mahirwe bwa minota 30 kugira ngo tusuzume ebyo okenna.

hero.title: Ku bireetera EXCI-MAA
hero.subtitle: Omufatanyabikorwa wo ow'eby'obusuubuzi okwesigika
hero.description: N'emyaka esinga 27 y'obukulembeze mu by'okukola by'eby'obusuubuzi, EXCI-MAA yabadde omufatanyabikorwa okwesigika ku bikoresho mu nsi nyingi, etanga obukulembeze bw'omugaso mu kubala, okukakasa, n'okukulembeza.

mission.title: Eby'okukola byaffe
mission.description1: Eby'okukola byaffe by'okukola ni okuyamba n'okuyambako ebikoresho ebikola mu nsiko y'Abafirika okutuuka ku bukulembeze bw'eby'obusuubuzi. Tuganyulira okumanya okw'omugaso ku by'okukola by'omugaso n'ebitali by'omugaso, tutanga obukulembeze, okukakasa kw'amategeko, n'okukulembeza bwekukwatagana n'obukulembeze bw'ekigo kyonna.
mission.description2: Ebisubizo byaffe byateekebwawo okukola ku byetaaga by'ebikoresho ku lukalu lwonna lwa Afirika, okutanga serivisi yonna n'akamaro k'omugaso—ku mwenda gw'omugaso. Ekibiina kyaffe ekirina obukulembeze bw'omugaso n'ensi yonna kikakasa okuyamba bwekukwatagana, bwekukwatagana n'obukulembeze n'amaanyi g'ekikolwa kyo.

story.title: Ebyafaayo byaffe
story.description1: EXCI-MAA yatandikibwawo n'abakulembeze mu kukakasa, kubala, omusolo, obukulembeze bw'ebikoresho, sisitemu y'amakulu g'okukulembeza, n'amategeko. N'obukulembeze mu Kanada, Amereka, Bufalansa, Bungereza, n'Afirika yonna, tuleeta obukulembeze bw'ensi yonna bwekukwatagana n'obukulembeze bw'omuntu wonna.
story.description2: Tukola ku lukalala lwonna lw'akamaro k'ebikolwa by'abakiriya baffe, tukakasa obukulembeze n'okukkirizibwa n'abafatanyabikorwa. Ekibuga kyaffe kiyambako amashyira mu nsi nyingi binyuze mu murongo ogw'amaanyi n'amatsinda ku ttaka, okutanga serivisi y'obukulembeze n'ebisubizo bwekukwatagana n'ebintu by'omugaso by'omuntu.
story.description3: Leero, tukomeza okwongera obukulembeze bwaffe nga tukomeza okukkirizibwa ku ntego zaffe z'okukola: obukulembeze, okukkirizibwa, n'okukola. Okuva ku kukakasa kw'amategeko n'ebikwatagana okutuuka ku kukulembeza kw'okukola n'obukulembeze bwekukwatagana, amatsinda gaffe gatanga emirimu egikomeye n'ekola etanga ebisubizo ebikomeze.
services: Okuyamba ku bw'okukola, okugatta, okukola oba okukyusa
Obukulembeze bwekukwatagana ku bikoresho n'ebikoresho bitono n'ebikulu

history.title: Olugendo lwaffe
history.subtitle: Emyaka esinga 20 y'obukulembeze mu by'okukola by'eby'obusuubuzi

timeline.title: Okutandikibwa kwa EXCI-MAA
timeline.description: Yatandikibwawo mu Yaoundé, Cameroon, n'entegeka y'okutanga serivisi z'omugaso z'okubala n'eby'obusuubuzi ku bikoresho by'omuntu.

timeline.title: Okwongera ku gace
timeline.description: Serivisi zongeddwa okukola Afirika ey'omu, zashyirawo amabiro mu nkengero z'eby'obusuubuzi ez'omugaso ku gace.

timeline.title: Okukkirizibwa ku nsi yonna
timeline.description: Bahabwa okukkirizibwa ku nsi yonna ku bukulembeze bw'omugaso mu by'okukola by'eby'obusuubuzi n'obukulembeze bw'okukkirizibwa.

timeline.title: Okukyusa eby'okukola
timeline.description: Byashyizibwawo obukulembeze bw'eby'obusuubuzi bw'omugaso bwo kuyamba serivisi n'obukulembeze bw'abakiriya.

timeline.title: Obukulembeze bw'ensi yonna
timeline.description: Byashyizibwawo obufatanyabikorwa n'amashyira g'ensi yonna, serivisi zongeddwa ku bakiriya mu nsi 6+.

timeline.title: Obukulembeze bw'ekibiina
timeline.description: Ekibiina kyaffe kyongedde okutuuka ku bakulembeze 50+, kyongedde obukulembeze bwaffe nga ekibuga ky'omugaso ky'eby'obusuubuzi.

history.journeyContinues: Olugendo lwaffe lulukomeze nga tukomeza obukulembeze mu serivisi yonna etulanga.

values.title: Eby'omugaso byaffe by'okukola
values.subtitle: Enkola ezituyamba mu kazi kaffe era zitegeeza obukulembeze bwaffe

values.name: Obukulembeze
values.description: Tukakasa okutanga serivisi z'omugaso z'omugaso, tukomeza obukulembeze bwaffe n'enkola z'okuyamba abakiriya.

values.name: Okukkirizibwa
values.description: Tukakasa obukulembeze bw'omugaso bw'omugaso, tukakasa obukulembeze, okukkirizibwa, n'obukulembeze mu bikolwa byaffe byonna.

values.name: Obukulembeze
values.description: Tukakasa eby'okukola ebipya n'ebisubizo by'omugaso okutanga serivisi z'omugaso ezisobola abakiriya baffe.

values.name: Okutekateeka ku mukiriya
values.description: Tukakasa obukulembeze bw'omugaso bwo kutegeera ebyetaaga by'omugaso by'abakiriya baffe n'okutanga ebisubizo bwekukwatagana bitanga akamaro k'omugaso.

values.name: Obukulembeze
values.description: Tukakasa obukulembeze bw'omugaso bw'obukulembeze, okukkirizibwa, n'obukulembeze mu byonna by'akazi kaffe.

values.name: Obufatanyabikorwa
values.description: Tukakasa okukolagana hafi n'abakiriya baffe, tukola nga obukulembeze bw'ekibiina kyabwe okutuuka ku bukulembeze bw'omugaso.
